harbormaster_intro.description: You are shown into a cramped office. The harbormaster eyes your crew...

1.text: Pay the docking fee (10 gold × local price modifier).
1.result: You pay promptly. The harbormaster warms a touch.

2.text: Negotiate a reduced fee (chance based on Omar’s mood).
2.result: You try to reason with him...

3.result: You anchor beyond the harbor. Supplies will be harder to get.
